attributes.action: A Peoples vote from the U.K. to rejoining the E.U
attributes.additional_details: I want a debate to show what benefits there have not been for the U.K. and a peoples vote to see if they would like to return to the European Union and also to include all 16 year olds in the vote.
attributes.background:
After being told life would be better out of the European Union. I feel we have been sold A Lie .Our democracy is being eroded through legislation.our standards of living are being eroded throughout society 
Our workers rights are being attacked. Things have not got better. They are getting worse.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625314
